result.execSummary:
The defendant Peter Raymond Gervais was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

w/report
w/report
Statement of negotiated plea.

Defendant Peter Raymond Gervais in court with attorney Paul M Goetz.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called appearances given.  Court to hear a competency hearing.  Court asks parties if they have received the reports.  Defense addresses the court.  Deft does contest the findings that he is found competent.  State does not challenge.  Court has reviewed the reports and finds the deft competent and will proceed with the criminal cases.    Court will enter a order that during these proceedings that the deft take all required medications to maintain competency.    Reports from the Doctor are to be given to the clerk and to be sealed.    Parties have an agreement on the first two cases but would need a offer on the third case.  

Parties are ready to proceed to plea and sentencing.  State recalls the cases for the Plea and sentencing at 10:53 am.
DNA sample unless already done.

Victim rights have been complied with.  Deft enters a plea of guilty to Count 1 in 16CM156 and 16CM161.  16CM203 are DRI.   Plea questionnaire reviewed. Clerk directed to enter plea. Factual basis. Court accepts pleas & finds guilty.

16CM156:
1 year Probation w/held sentence
  Court Costs and any applicable assessments, fees and surcharges due the court.
  Followup w/any mental health evaluations
  No contact w/RH
  Comply with all mental health recommendations
  Take all medications as prescribed
  Counseling as deemed necessary by agent.
  Sentence credit to be determined

16CM161
12 months  Probation w/held sentence
  Court Costs and any applicable assessments, fees and surcharges due the court.
  Follup w/any mental health evaluations
  Counseling as deemed necessary by agent.
  Comply with all mental health recommendations
  Take all medications as prescribed
  Number of days for jail credit to be held open to give defense time to check on number of days.

Allocation of sentence if revoked will depend on if cases are concurrent or conseq.
Hearing on April 10, 2017 at 10:30 am.
Court response to Mendota Mental Health Institute
from Mendota
in regards to sentence credit.  2 days in 16CM156, 30 days in 16CM161 and 77 days in 16CM203
granted
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: of commitment for treatment (incompetency)
from Doctor Rebecca Seifert PSY D

Defendant Peter Raymond Gervais in court, in custody with attorney Cana G Kohn.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.Cases called appearances given. Victim rights have been complied with.  The report of the doctor has been reviewed by the parties.  Court addresses the parties.  Reports states that at this time is incompetent to proceed but should regain competency.  State and defense waives a evidency hearing.  Court addresses the deft and the deft is not requesting a hearing at this time.  Court finds the deft incompetent to proceed at this time.  Will schedule accordingly for reviews of the case.  Needs to regain within 9 months.  Court to enter a orders of incompetency places the reasons on the record.  Court also orders the deft to take the necessary medications that are prescribed.  Court orders the proceedings to be suspended.  Deft is placed in the custody of the health care facility.    Will need the sentence credit in the cases.  Sheriff dept will transport the deft as needed to the health care facilty.

Defendant Peter Raymond Gervais in court, in custody with attorney Cana G Kohn.  Kurt Byron Zengler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called appearances given.  Defense attorney is requesting the court to order a competency evaluation.  Court addresses the attorney.  Court orders a competency evaluation to be completed for all three files.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 1, 2016 at 08:00 am.
Hearing on November 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.
deft is to take all prescribed medicines in the prescibed dosages by the doctors.  No contact w/RH  If three party committment happens the cash bond will convert to a sign bond.

State request that the bond be modified to take all prescribed medicines.  Scheduling conference scheduled for October 27, 2016 at 08:00 am.
